name: Situation des droits de l’homme au Bangladesh, en particulier le cas d’Odhikar - Human rights situation in Bangladesh, notably the case of Odhikar - Die Menschenrechtslage in Bangladesch, insbesondere der Fall Odhikar - RC- - § 4 - Am 3
title: Resolution on the human rights situation in Bangladesh, notably the case of Odhikar
